00057 // CondSynMech definition
00058 // unitary synaptic conductance from event at t=0:g(t)=gbar*(exp(-t/tauA -exp(-m*t/tauB))
00060 
00061 class CondSynMech
00062         : public SynMechInterface
00063 {
00064     template <class SynData, class SynMech, class PlastMech, class TypeBase> friend class SynapseTemplate;
00065     friend class IFMech;
00066 public:
00067     explicit CondSynMech(ConfigBase * const cfg);
00068     ~CondSynMech() {
00069         delete[] alphajump_;
00070     }
00071 protected:
00072 //  template <class TypeImpl> void get_updated_states(TypeImpl & neuron)
00073     void send_updated_states(double & current) {
00074         throw Error("CondSynMech: should not be used");
00075     }
00076     void send_updated_states(double & conductance, double & current);
00077     void on_preneuron_fire_update(const Time & tspike, const double & synweight);
00078 private:
00080 
00082     void perform_calculations();
00084     const CondSynMechConfig * const csmcfg_; // tauA_, tauB_, factorA_, factorB_, gmin_, gmax_, Vreversal_
00085     double conductance_, current_;
00086     double alphaA_, alphaB_; // state variables for conductance
00087     double * alphajump_;
00088     Size nextjump_; //
00089     Size spot_;
00090 };
00091

00095 // inline definitions
00097 
00099 // constructor
00100 inline CondSynMech::CondSynMech(ConfigBase * const configurator)
00101         : csmcfg_(dynamic_cast<CondSynMechConfig *>(configurator))
00102         , current_(0.)
00103         , conductance_(0.)
00104         , alphaA_(0.)
00105         , alphaB_(0.)
00106         , nextjump_(0)
00107 {
00108     if (! csmcfg_) throw ConfigError("CondSynMech: void configurator");
00109 
00110     alphajump_ = new double [ SimEnv::i_max_delay()];
00111     for (Size i = 0; i < SimEnv::i_max_delay(); ++i)
00112         alphajump_[i] = 0.0;
00113 }
00114 
00116 // update when the presynaptic neuron fires
00117 inline void CondSynMech::on_preneuron_fire_update(const Time & time_lag_to_spike, const double & synweight)
00118 {
00119 //  old style
00120 //  Size spot = ((Size) ceil( time_lag_to_spike / SimEnv::timestep() ) + nextjump_ ) % SimEnv::i_max_delay();
00121 
00122     spot_ = nextjump_ + (Size) ceil(time_lag_to_spike / SimEnv::timestep());
00123     if (spot_ >= SimEnv::i_max_delay()) spot_ -= SimEnv::i_max_delay();
00124 
00125 #ifdef _DEBUG
00126     if ((spot_ >= SimEnv::i_max_delay()) || (spot_ < 0))
00127         std::cout << "CondSynMech: wrong spot_";
00128 #endif
00129 
00130     alphajump_[spot_] += synweight;
00131 }
00132 
00134 // send the updated states (current and conductance) to the neuron activation mechanism
00135 inline void CondSynMech::send_updated_states(double & conductance, double & current)
00136 {
00137     perform_calculations();
00138     current += current_;
00139     conductance += conductance_;
00140 }
00141 
00143 // update when the presynaptic neuron fires
00144 inline void CondSynMech::perform_calculations()
00145 {
00146     ++nextjump_;
00147     if (nextjump_ == SimEnv::i_max_delay()) nextjump_ = 0;
00148 
00149     alphaA_ *= csmcfg_->factorA();
00150     alphaA_ += alphajump_[nextjump_];
00151     alphaB_ *= csmcfg_->factorB();
00152     alphaB_ += alphajump_[nextjump_];
00153     // prepare the results of the computation to the Synapse object
00154     conductance_ = alphaB_ - alphaA_;
00155     current_ = conductance_ * csmcfg_->Vreversal();
00156 
00157     alphajump_ [nextjump_] = 0.0;
00158 }
